tiles.title: Many different actions
tiles.text: We provide a large range of different moderation actions. Everything from warn, mute, kick and ban.

tiles.title: Log all your actions
tiles.text: Log any actions made by yourself or by your moderators in your dedicated log channels.

tiles.title: Flexible greeting messages
tiles.text: Easily greet your new members the way you want to with our highly flexible greeting messages.

tiles.title: Welcome roles
tiles.text: Give your new users and bots a role upon joining the server. You can add up to 10 roles!

tiles.title: Channel selector
tiles.text: Select where the greeting messages should appear. Send the new member a custom DM message.

tiles.title: Log all actions
tiles.text: Log any actions made by yourself or by your moderators in your dedicated log channels.

tiles.title: Action-specific settings
tiles.text: Customize the settings for a specific action. Choose where logs for certain actions appear.

tiles.title: Easily accessed logs
tiles.text: All your server’s logs can be viewed, filtered and modified right here on our dashboard.

tiles.title: Flexible todo lists
tiles.text: Flexible todo lists integrated right into your server. Commands for everything you could need to interact with your list.

tiles.title: Server and user todos
tiles.text: Create a todo list for an entire server, or your own personal todo list in Onixo’s DMs.

tiles.title: Highly customizable settings
tiles.text: All of our modules and commands have highly customizable settings! Change the functionality and display of our features to your own liking.

tiles.title: Dashboard approved
tiles.text: Update all your settings directly on our dashboard. No commands needed.
